articles.description: Researchers with Google's Threat Analysis Group (TAG) and Project Zero discovered a zero-day exploit (CVE-2020-16009) last week. On Monday, Google released Chrome patch 86.0.4240.183 for Windows, macOS,...
articles.content: PSA: Over the last couple of weeks, Google has been busy patching several actively exploited security holes in its Chrome browser. The latest uses a flaw In the desktop version's V8 JavaScript engine… [+1924 chars]
